00053 class PciIdsVendor
00054 {
00055   
00056 private:
00058   std::string code;
00059   
00061   std::string name;
00062 
00064   std::vector<PciIdsDevice*> kid_list;
00065   
00066 public:
00067   
00069 
00075   PciIdsVendor(std::string vCode, std::string vName) : code(vCode), name(vName)
00076   {
00077   }
00078 
00079 
00081 
00084   ~PciIdsVendor();
00085 
00086 
00088 
00093   void add_kid(PciIdsDevice* kid)
00094   {
00095     kid_list.push_back(kid);
00096   }
00097 
00098 
00100 
00105   std::string get_code (void) const
00106   {
00107     return code;
00108   }
00109 
00110 
00112 
00117   std::string get_name (void) const
00118   {
00119     return name;
00120   }
00121

00132   int store_db();

00134 };

00147 class PciIdsDevice
00148 {
00149   
00150 private:
00152   PciIdsVendor* parent_vendor;
00153 
00155   std::string code;
00156 
00158   std::string name;
00159 
00161   std::vector<PciIdsSubsys*> subsystem_list;
00162 
00163 public:
00164 
00166 
00174   PciIdsDevice(PciIdsVendor* dParent, std::string dCode, std::string dName)
00175     : parent_vendor(dParent), code(dCode), name(dName)
00176   {
00177     dParent->add_kid(this);     // Add current instance to it's Vendor's Device list.
00178   }
00179 
00180 
00182 
00185   ~PciIdsDevice();
00186 
00187 
00189 
00194   void add_subsystem(PciIdsSubsys* subsystem)
00195   {
00196     subsystem_list.push_back(subsystem);
00197   }
00198 
00199 
00201 
00206   std::string get_code (void) const
00207   {
00208     return code;
00209   }
00210 
00211 
00213 
00218   std::string get_name (void) const
00219   {
00220     return name;
00221   }
00222 
00223 
00225 
00230   const PciIdsVendor* const get_parent (void) const
00231   {
00232     return parent_vendor;
00233   }
00234 
00235   friend int PciIdsVendor::store_db();
00236     
00237 };

00248 class PciIdsSubsys
00249 {
00250   
00251 private:
00253   PciIdsDevice* parent_device;
00254   
00255   std::string subvendor,        
00256     subdevice,                  
00257     name;                       
00259 public:
00260 
00262 
00272   PciIdsSubsys(PciIdsDevice* sParent, std::string sVendor, std::string sDevice, std::string sName)
00273     : parent_device(sParent), subvendor(sVendor), subdevice(sDevice), name(sName)
00274   {
00275     sParent->add_subsystem(this);   // Add current instance to it's Device's Subsystem list.
00276   }
00277 
00278 
00280 
00285   std::string get_subVendor (void) const
00286   {
00287     return subvendor;
00288   }
00289

00299     return subdevice;
00300   }

00314
